about_the_game:
What can 《Figure Workshop》 do?


《Figure Workshop> is a virtual Figure maker,which generate by MMD model and motion.It can customize materials and expressions of figures, and there are also several interesting scenes for photography.

If you want to experience the feeling of your favorite anime character's figures filling the room, or if you want to experience the fun of figure photography, here can all fulfill your wishes.


How to make



  • You need to prepare the MMD model file (PMX, PMD format) for the character you want to make, as well as an motion file (VMD format).

  • After importing the model and the motion, 《Figure Workshop》 will pre calculate the pose of each frame and capture it, which will be displayed in the form of a slide show. You can select one from it as the figure pose.

  • Add base: Customize base color, transparency, and pattern

  • Custom expressions



  • Generate a figure and drag it to your cabinet

Characteristics


  • Supports model files in PMX, PMD formats, and motion data in VMD format

  • Supports model files in VRM formats

  • Support humanoid models (Anime characters, Ultraman, Hilichurls, etc.)

  • Default anime realistic hybrid rendering system, imported models automatically adapt to texture and lighting parameters, no need to set

  • There are two scenes of school dormitories and apartments, and display slots have been set up for you to collect figures
  • emoticon modifier
  • Material modifier
  • Support steam workshops
  • Has two location scenes: PC case and Car show

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7/Windows8/Windows10/Windows11
  • Processor: Intel i3 / AMD FX-6000
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows7/Windows8/Windows10/Windows11
  • Processor: Intel i5 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD HD7870, 2 GB VRAM or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
